name: Survey and Lessons Learned Quality Model

measurable_concepts.name: Bug fixing cost
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the bug fixing cost in the project
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Increased bug fixing costs affect overall costs negatively

measurable_concepts.name: Maintenance cost
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the cost of maintenance
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Elevated levels of maintenance costs affect overall costs negatively

measurable_concepts.name: Number of Contributors
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the number of contributors in the project
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Increased number of contributors affects overall costs positively

measurable_concepts.name: Core Maintainers
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the number of core contributors in the project
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Increased number of core contributors affects overall costs positively

measurable_concepts.name: Issue Throughput
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the ratio of closed issues to total issues in the project
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Increased closed issues to total issues ratio affects overall costs positively

measurable_concepts.name: Change Requests Duration
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the duration to resolve issues
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Longer durations to resolve issues affect community capability negatively

measurable_concepts.name: Change Requests Accepted
measurable_concepts.entity: pull requests in version control history
measurable_concepts.information_need: The amount of pull requests accepted in the project
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Affects community capability positively

measurable_concepts.name: Change Requests Declined
measurable_concepts.entity: pull requests in version control history
measurable_concepts.information_need: The amount of pull requests rejected in the project
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Affects community capability negatively

measurable_concepts.name: Issues New
measurable_concepts.information_need: Amount of new issues in the version control history
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: New issues are a proxy for activity and affect community capability positively

measures.name: New Issues Ratio
measures.unit: new issues in a period - total issues ratio

measurable_concepts.name: Issues Active
measurable_concepts.information_need: Amount of active issues in the version control history
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Updating issues signals community activity and affect community capability positively

measures.name: New Issues Ratio
measures.unit: new issues in a period - total issues ratio

measurable_concepts.name: Issues Closed
measurable_concepts.information_need: Amount of closed issues in the version control history
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Closing issues is a proxy for community activity and affect community capability positively

measures.name: Closed Issues Ratio
measures.unit: closed issues in a period - total issues ratio

measurable_concepts.name: Issue Age Average
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculation of how long issues have been open for
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Long open issue age affects community capability negatively

measurable_concepts.name: Issue Resolution Duration
measurable_concepts.entity: pull requests in version control history
measurable_concepts.information_need: The duration of time taken to accept or decline a pull request
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Longer time to resolve pull requests affects community capability negatively

measurable_concepts.name: Flexible maintenance according to individual needs
measurable_concepts.information_need: Ease of maintenance of the source code
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Easy maintainability contributes to the overall costs positively

measurable_concepts.name: Absence of license fees
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculation of absence of fees
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Absence of fees affects cost positively

measurable_concepts.name: Number of releases
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculation of the number of releases
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Number of releases affects reliability positively

measurable_concepts.name: Reliability Rating
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the reliability rating of a repository
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Reliability affects quality positively

measurable_concepts.name: Average number of functions per class
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the average number of methods per class
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Increased number of methods per class affects quality negatively

measures.name: Avg number of functions per class

measurable_concepts.name: Ease of Maintenance
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the maintainability rating of a repository
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Maintainability affects quality positively

measurable_concepts.name: Documentation
measurable_concepts.information_need: Calculating the average Gunning Fog Index of files in the repository
measurable_concepts.quality_requirement: Smaller Gunning Fog Index affects the readability of documentation positively
